Subscription.Query:
<QueryList>
<!-- ########################################################################## --> <!-- # Basic EventIDs # --> <!-- ########################################################################## -->
<Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- SID History added to an account (4765) --> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=7001 or EventID=7002) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4765) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- AppLocker packaged (Modern UI) app execution --> <Query Id="1" Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Execution"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Execution">*TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- AppLocker packaged (Modern UI) app installation --> <Query Id="2" Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Deployment"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Deployment">*TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="3" Path="System"> <!-- Other Log cleared events (104)--> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=104) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="4" Path="Security"> <!-- user initiated logoff --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4647) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="5" Path="Security"> <!-- Service logon events if the user account isn't LocalSystem, NetworkService, LocalService --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4624) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]] and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="LogonType"]="5"]]) and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="TargetUserSid"] != "S-1-5-18"]]) and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="TargetUserSid"] != "S-1-5-19"]]) and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="TargetUserSid"] != "S-1-5-20"]])</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="6" Path="Security"> <!-- user logoff for all non-network logon sessions--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4634) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]] and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="LogonType"] != "3"]])</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="7" Path="Security"> <!-- Local credential authentication events (4776), Logon with explicit credentials (4648) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4776 or EventID=4648) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- Special Privileges (Admin-equivalent Access) assigned to new logon, excluding LocalSystem--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4672) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> <Suppress Path="Security">*[EventData[Data[1]="S-1-5-18"]]</Suppress> </Query>
<Query Id="9" Path="Security"> <!-- Security Log cleared events (1102), EventLog Service shutdown (1100)--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=1102 or EventID = 1100) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="10" Path="Security"> <!-- LSA Modifictations (4610, 4611, 4614, 4622)--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4610 or EventID=4611 or EventID=4614 or EventID=4622) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="11" Path="Security"> <!-- A handle to an object was requested (SAM/DSA Access) (4661)--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4661) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="12" Path="Security"> <!-- System audit policy was changed (4719)--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4719) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="13" Path="Security"> <!-- New user added to global security group --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4728 or EventID=4729) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="14" Path="Application"> <!-- EMET events --> <Select Path="Application">*TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]] and [System[Provider[@Name='EMET']]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="15" Path="Security"> <!-- New user added to universal security group--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4756) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="16" Path="Security"> <!-- New user added to local security group--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4732) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="17" Path="Security"> <!-- User removed from local Administrators group--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4733) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]] and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="TargetUserName"]="Administrators"]])</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="18" Path="Security"> <!-- Local logons without network or service events --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4624) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]] and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="LogonType"]!="3"]]) and (*[EventData[Data[@Name="LogonType"]!="5"]])</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="19" Path="Security"> <!-- New User Account Created(4720) --> <!-- User Account Enabled (4722) --> <!-- User Account Disabled (4725) --> <!-- User Account Deleted (4726) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4720 or EventID=4722 or EventID=4725 or EventID=4726) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="20" Path="Security"> <!-- LSASS Auditing (Mimikatz auditing)* (3065 and 3066) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=3065 or EventID=3066) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="21" Path="Security"> <!-- LSA Protections (3033 and 3063) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=3033 or EventID=3063) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="22" Path="Security"> <!-- A user's local group membership was enumerated (4798) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4798) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="23" Path="Application"> <!-- User logging on with Temporary profile (1511), cannot create profile, using temporary profile (1518)--> <Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-User Profiles Service'] and (EventID=1511 or EventID=1518) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="24" Path="System"> <!-- Interactive Logon (7001) and Logoff (7002) --> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=7001 or EventID=7002) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="25" Path="System"> <!-- Service Install (7000), service start failure (7045), new service (4697) --> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Service Control Manager'] and (EventID = 7000 or EventID=7045) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4697) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="26" Path="System"> <!-- System Logs --> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=2003 or EventID=4738 or EventID=7036) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="27" Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL"> <!-- AppLocker EXE events or Script events --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL">*TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]] and [UserData[RuleAndFileData[PolicyName="EXE"]]]</Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/MSI and Script">*TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="28" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational"> <!-- New Task Registered (106 ,140 and 4698) --> <!-- Task Updated (4702) --> <!-- Task Registration Deleted (141) --> <!-- Task Deleted (142) --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler'] and (EventID=106 or EventID=140 or EventID=141 or EventID=142 or EventID=4698 or EventID=4702) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler'] and (EventID=106 or EventID=140 or EventID=141 or EventID=142 or EventID=4698 or EventID=4702) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="29" Path="Microsoft-Windows-ReliabilityAnalysisComponent/Operational"> <!-- System Reliability Monitoring (2005) --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-ReliabilityAnalysisComponent/Operational">*[System[(EventID=2005) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="30" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Resource-Exhaustion-Detector/Operational"> <!-- System Resource Exhausted Monitoring (2004) --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Resource-Exhaustion-Detector/Operational">*[System[(EventID=2004) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="31" Path="Microsoft-Windows-DriverFrameworks-UserMode/Operational"> <!-- USB device monitoring. Detects connections, drivers loaded, unloaded and disconnection --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-DriverFrameworks-UserMode/Operational">*[System[(EventID=1003 or EventID=2010 or EventID=1006 or EventID=2102) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="32" Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational"> <!-- PowerShell engine started (4100) --> <!-- execute block activity (4103) --> <!-- Remote Command(4104) --> <!-- Start Command(4105) --> <!-- Stop Command(4106) --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational">*[System[(EventID=4100 or EventID=4103 or EventId=4104 or EventId=4105 or EventId=4106) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="33" Path="Windows PowerShell"> <!-- Powershell script block and module logging --> <Select Path="Windows PowerShell">*[System[(EventID=400 or EventID=800) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="34" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> <!-- Modern SysMon event provider--> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational">*TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- ##########################################################################--> <!-- # DC Specific EventIDs #--> <!-- ##########################################################################-->
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- A Kerberos authentication ticket (TGT) was requested (4768) --> <!-- User requests a Kerberos service ticket (4769)--> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4768 OR EventID=4769) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- SID History added to an account (4765) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4765) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- DSRM account password change attemped (4794) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4794) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- Admin account ACLs set (4780) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4780) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- Custom group logon tracking (4964) (requires regkey modification) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4964) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- Domain Policy was changed (4739) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4739) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- Kerberos policy was changed (4713) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4713) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- An attempt was made to reset an account's password (4724) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4724) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- A security-enabled local group was changed (4735) --> <!-- A security-enabled global group was changed (4737) --> <!-- A security-enabled univarsal group was changed (4755) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4735 or EventID=4737 or EventID=4755) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- Kerberos pre-authentication & malicious edits (5136) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5136) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <!-- A replay attack was detected (could be false positive) (4649) --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4649) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 3600000]]]</Select> </Query>
</QueryList>
